.. _sphx_glr_auto_examples_testing_segmented_plot_0_classification.py:


Segmented Diagnose (Classification)
========================================================

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 8-9

Experiment initialization and data preparation

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 9-17

.. code-block:: default

    from piml import Experiment
    from piml.models import XGB2Classifier

    exp = Experiment()
    exp.data_loader("SimuCredit", silent=True)
    exp.data_summary(feature_exclude=["Race", "Gender"], silent=True)
    exp.data_prepare(target="Approved", task_type="classification", silent=True)








.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 18-19

Train Model

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 19-21

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_train(XGB2Classifier(), name="XGB2")








.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 22-23

Summary of all segments (top 10 with the worst performance)

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 23-25

.. code-block:: default

    exp.segmented_diagnose(model="XGB2", show="segment_table", segment_method="auto")





.. rst-class:: sphx-glr-script-out

 .. code-block:: none

    <pandas.io.formats.style.Styler object at 0x000001ECAA506580>




.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 26-27

Summary of all segments of a given feature (top 10 with the worst performance)

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 27-29

.. code-block:: default

    exp.segmented_diagnose(model="XGB2", show="segment_table", segment_method="auto", segment_feature="Balance")





.. rst-class:: sphx-glr-script-out

 .. code-block:: none

    <pandas.io.formats.style.Styler object at 0x000001ED122097F0>




.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 30-31

accuracy talbe of the samples in that segment

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 31-34

.. code-block:: default

    exp.segmented_diagnose(model="XGB2", show="accuracy_table", 
                           segment_id=0, segment_method="auto", segment_feature="Balance")





.. rst-class:: sphx-glr-script-out

 .. code-block:: none

               ACC      AUC       F1 LogLoss   Brier
                                                
    Train   0.7563   0.8512   0.7622  0.4899  0.1604
    Test    0.5397   0.5777   0.5538  0.7566  0.2760
    Gap    -0.2166  -0.2735  -0.2084  0.2667  0.1156




.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 35-36

residual analysis of the samples in that segment

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 36-40

.. code-block:: default

    exp.segmented_diagnose(model="XGB2", show="accuracy_residual", 
                           segment_id=0, segment_method="auto", segment_feature="Balance",
                           show_feature="Mortgage", figsize=(5, 4))




.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/testing_segmented/images/sphx_glr_plot_0_classification_001.png
   :alt: Residual Plot
   :srcset: /auto_examples/testing_segmented/images/sphx_glr_plot_0_classification_001.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 41-42

Weakspot analysis of the samples in that segment

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 42-46

.. code-block:: default

    exp.segmented_diagnose(model="XGB2", show="weakspot", 
                           segment_id=0, segment_method="auto", segment_feature="Balance",
                           slice_features=["Mortgage"], metric="AUC", figsize=(5, 4))




.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/testing_segmented/images/sphx_glr_plot_0_classification_002.png
   :alt: Weak Regions
   :srcset: /auto_examples/testing_segmented/images/sphx_glr_plot_0_classification_002.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 47-48

distribution distance comparison between the specificed segment and the remaining (feature-by-feature)

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 48-52

.. code-block:: default

    res = exp.segmented_diagnose(model="XGB2", show="distribution_shift",
                                 segment_id=0, segment_method="auto", segment_feature="Balance",
                                 figsize=(5, 4), return_data=True)




.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/testing_segmented/images/sphx_glr_plot_0_classification_003.png
   :alt: Data distance(In segment vs. out of segment)
   :srcset: /auto_examples/testing_segmented/images/sphx_glr_plot_0_classification_003.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 53-54

distribution distance comparison between the specificed segment and the remaining (density of one selected feature)

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 54-57

.. code-block:: default

    res = exp.segmented_diagnose(model="XGB2", show="distribution_shift",
                                 segment_id=0, segment_method="auto", segment_feature="Balance",
                                 show_feature="Mortgage", figsize=(5, 4), return_data=True)
